name: mediabox productions
description:
We offer a wide range of services to inform, innovate and inspire. We can help ANY business with their needs with prices to suit all budgets.  So please get in touch. We work with local, national and global clients across all sectors including: manufacturing, health, tourism, public sector, charities, education and tourism. Our creative vision and dynamic ideas enable us to showcase your business, product, service or event to your project brief.
We specialise in Video Production, Animation and Web Design as well as helping you plan how to use them for maximum effect.  For all our projects we recommend using one of our professional voice over artists who have voiced projects worldwide. We also offer green screen and can transfer tapes to DVD as well as your slides to JPG. Please contact us for a quote. We film on the latest high definition broadcast cameras capable of achieving 4K resolution. This ensures that our clients businesses always look their best. Our green screen facility gives us the freedom to film our clients in a controlled environment. This gives us the flexibility to replace the green screen background with any background of our clients choosing. This could include their services and logo. We also have full in house post production facilities, editing on the latest Adobe CC software.
